attributes.action: Inolving the Army in times of serious public unrest
attributes.additional_details:
What we are witnessing is a blatant disregard for the law. Enfield has come under attack tonight in all parts. The Police are stretched to the limit and cannot contain the spread of violence.

I, like many other Enfield residents, am disgusted at the scenes being witnessed tonight and I call on the government to serioulsy consider involving the Army or Reservist at these times to bring back order to our communities.
